document_data.name: Al-Hyam Dhazid
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Hyam Dhazid''' was a [[magic-user]] in [[Phlan]] in [[1340 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Al-Hyam acted as an advisor for [[Tyranthraxus]], trying to learn his secrets. However, Tyranthraxus tricked Al-Hyam and he believed he served a true [[dragon]].
